item.title: I deleted this subchapter from my PhD
item.description: When I was working on my phd dissertation, the first draft of chapter 1 got way up in the clouds. It was during a time where I was reflecting on myself and my journey over the past 12 years of research, and I was feeling rather spiritual. Here’s a snippet from my original Chapter 1, the intro, which captures the vibe I was going for. Ultimately it was not the right fit but there were some pretty ideas that I’ll probably explore more in the near future.
